title: unesco_heritage_Shrines_and_Temples_of_Nikko
text:
Name: Shrines and Temples of Nikko. short_description:

The shrines and temples of Nikko, together with their natural surroundings, have for centuries been a sacred site known for its architectural and decorative masterpieces. They are closely associated with the history of the Tokugawa Shoguns.

. date_inscribed: 1999. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 139.6105556. latitude: 36.7475. area_hectares: 50.8. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Japan. Region: Asia and the Pacific. iso_code: jp. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
